post:
We are a privately owned data center in Tampa FL. We operate a fiber ring with paths capable of supporting gigabit transfers and MPLS. Acehost.com mission is to be a one-stop shop for all of its customer’s bandwidth and custom telecommunications needs.

Cloud services. colocation, dedicated servers, wireless internet connectivity, managed services, internet phone systems and individual to enterprise level backup and storage. Acehost.com provides Data Center Hosting services, and IP (IPv4) Address Leasing. With service to more than 15 countries around the globe, they strive to bring you the best equipment possible, and the friendliest support, ’round the clock.

99.9% uptime on dual power grids, 24/7 secured access, web-based monitoring, and Tier one bandwidth. Our disaster recovery and colocation services are state-of-the-art. All systems are redundant and robust with their lightning speed fiber network.

We are currently offering 3 months free Service with 1 year sign up*
